<wei>.name: Wei
<wei>.info: He exudes quiet strength and sophistication, often portraying serious and intense characters. His minimalist style enhances his charismatic presence.

<cho>.name: Cho
<cho>.info: A rising actress with a bright and cheerful aura, she brings energy to the screen and stage alike. Her youthful confidence and style catch the spotlight with ease.

<jae>.name: Jae
<jae>.info: Known for his commanding presence and mature charm, he often takes on pivotal, emotionally complex roles. His sharp gaze adds weight to every performance.

<lee>.name: Lee
<lee>.info: A globally recognized actor, he is renowned for his versatile acting and warm smile. His refined appearance blends intensity with approachability.
